# .NET MAUI Project

- This is a .NET MAUI (Multi-platform App UI) application.
- The project uses C# and XAML.
- Target platforms: Android, iOS, macOS, Windows.
- Follow MVVM pattern for organizing code.
- Use XAML for UI definitions and C# for code-behind and view models.
